episodes.title: What is a Cult?- Legally Balanced with Vanessa Reiser, LCSW
episodes.description: Join Anna Blood and guest star Vanessa Reiser as they discuss various cults such as NXIVM, their narcissistic ties, and much more on Legally Balanced Podcast. You can find Vanessa's book "Narcissistic Abuse: A Therapist’s Guide to Identifying, Escaping, and Healing from Toxic and Manipulative People" on Amazon!
